reviews.review_text: Absolutely mesmerizing! Alex Michaelides crafts a psychological thriller that's impossible to put down. The plot twists are mind-bending, and the characters are deeply intriguing. A must-read for fans of the genre!

A gripping page-turner with a jaw-dropping twist! The Silent Patient kept me guessing until the very end. The psychological depth of the characters and the atmospheric setting make for an intense reading experience.
Enjoyed the premise but found some aspects predictable. The writing style is engaging, and the pacing is solid, but the resolution felt a bit rushed. Nonetheless, an entertaining read overall.
Riveting and suspenseful! The Silent Patient is a masterclass in storytelling. The unreliable narrator adds an extra layer of intrigue, and the twist at the end left me speechless. Highly recommend!

Engrossing from start to finish! Alex Michaelides creates a chilling atmosphere that keeps you on the edge of your seat. The exploration of trauma and the complexity of human psyche make this a compelling read.
